entries.rr16: Since I'm not bothering you, why don't you not bother me?
entries.rr15: Ok, we'll let you out of the Alliance.
entries.rr14: I'm tired of being shot at by Imperials!
entries.rr13: Hello friend.  What can I do for you?
entries.rr12: If all you're concerned about is how much trouble you're going to be in with the Empire then you're definitely not the kind of person we're looking for.
entries.rr11: Well, nevermind then.  I have more important things to do than stand around and explain myself to every nerf-herder that tries to chat with me.
entries.rr10: Good.  I will take your information and inform my commanding officers.  From this point on, you're officially part of the Rebellion.  Good luck soldier.
entries.rr9: I am.  I have no love for the Empire.
entries.rr8: Won't that get me in trouble with the Empire?
entries.rr7: Are you interested in joining the Rebel Alliance?
entries.rr6: I heard it from some of the rebel pilots.
entries.rr3: Uh...I don't know what you're talking about.
entries.rr2: But the sun doesn't shine in the swamps.
entries.rr1: The wind whistles in the willows...
